//Strings for Deezer Song Search API Song Search HELP Enter Artist's Name: Name SEARCH FAVOURITES
App Instructions "Type an artist's name into the text box and click the 'Search' button to get a list of their songs.

" "You may click on any of the songs in the list to get more details about them.

" "On the details page you can add a song to your favourites. 

" "The 'Favourites' button can be used to view songs saved to your favourites.

" "Clicking on any of the songs in this list will also provide you with details.

" "In the favourites list do a long click to open up a window where you can remove the song from your favourites." Close Do you want to remove this song from favourites? The song selected is by Yes No Search Complete!
"Title: " "Album: " "Duration: " ADD TO FAVOURITES HIDE You have already favourited this song! by added to favourites!
